failed.image: Your image may contain inappropriate content.

failed.default: Content in your post was flagged as potentially inappropriate.
failed.aiDescGeneral: Minga uses advanced AI to scan content but sometimes it makes a mistake.
failed.aiCanPostAnyways: If you believe that this is a mistake, you can go ahead and publish this content.
failed.aiNoPost: If you believe that this is a mistake, you can contact your Minga Manager to publish it for you.
